children.text: The reinforcing steel has been properly installed with adequate clearance to the plumbing pipes.
It is a requirement of section 5.3.2 Reinforcement of AS 2870 Residential Slabs and Footings, that
‘Reinforcement in rafts and slabs shall be placed with minimum concrete cover of 20mm to an internal surface’.

All of the steel reinforcement around the pipe penetrations has been checked, and has adequate clearance. Any areas where deficiencies were identified have been addressed, with the area ready for concrete to be poured.
